sensitivity: ISO 80-3200 ISO 6400, Hi 1 (equivalent to ISO 12800) (available when using P, S, A or M mode) Hi 2 (equivalent to ISO 25600) (available when using High ISO monochrome in special effects mode)
shutterspeed: 1/2000-1 s 1/2000-60 s (when ISO sensitivity is set to 80-400 in M mode) 1/4000 s (maximum speed during high-speed continuous shooting)
